I've been to a few Chiropractors over the last 10 years... since moving to Phoenix I was blessed to find the team at Dr. Picarello's of ice are fantastic! Super accommodating, knowledgeable, and friendly. They help keep my chronic neck and back problems from compromising my active lifestyle! They have fantastic massage therapists too! I wouldn't go to anyone else in the valley! Thank you Dr. P!

We love everyone at Valley Pediatric --  they make my children feel so at ease and are very welcoming.  The office is so clean - it shines and I don't think I've ever waited more than 2-3 minutes in the lobby.  It doesn't get better than Valley Pediatric Dentists

My sister in law recommended Valley Pediatric to me and rightfully so! The entire staff was wonderful! Dr. Amy worked her magic and took care of everything with in one visit. Now I understand why they have pediatric offices, you really need a special touch and understnading of how children think and they have it down pat here!!!

Dr Ash is very friendly and the office is very clean. My child was referred for a anesthesiologist and I never heard from the coordinator for that (I think located in their other office). They totally dropped the ball on that and I don't think I should have to keep calling for a status.

I knew right away that this was going to be my daughter's Orthodontist.  Dr. D is an amazing Ortho with the credentials to back it up.  However, his staff really puts them over the top!  These are the friendliest staff members I have ever met in any industry, period!  They even beat the pants off the employees at In 'n' Out, seriously.

Dr. D is the best and even followed up with a personal phone call on the weekend to make sure everything was okay with my daughters apparatus.  He is highly qualified, very passionate and caring, and spends quality time with both parent and patient to make sure they both understand every step of every procedure.

I can not recommend Team Orthodontics enough; and when I told my daughter's school where she was being seen, they also agreed 100% that Team Ortho is by far the best around.

Oh yeah, they also gave me a couple of very generous discounts that others did not offer.  You simply can not beat the friendly service and quality work here, trust me!

During the first visit I was treated very well, the staff is very friendly and professional
But on subsequent visits the doctor is very cold and if you have no money for treatments make you feel that there are no other options, recommend expensive treatments and offers no alternatives.

I work professionally with Dr. Snider and his staff. They are a wonderful group of people. I can tell how much they care about their patients and the quality work they provide. I would highly recommend this dental practice to anyone!.

I've had good experiences at this dental office. The staff is nice and the treatment was quick, painless and high quality. I'll be returning for regular checkups every 6 months. I'm glad my teeth are in good care here!

I used to dread going to the dentist until I was referred to this office. The entire staff is very friendly and professional.  They provide a warm welcome and actually remember you! I trust them and do not feel they are trying to recommend additional unnecessary work.  Each appointment is quick and enjoyable. 

I highly recommend this office!

I do not like going to dentist.  Dr. Hahn and her entire office made me feel like family.  From the minute I walked in I was greeted by friendly smiles welcoming me to the office.  Dr. Hahn was very friendly and  gentle but very professional and efficient.  My teeth look great and there was no anxiety or pain.  I will never put off going to my dentist again.  Thanks Dr. Hahn!

I have had the same family dentist for years.  Recently I moved which caused me to go in search of a new dentist.  I was referred to a dentist by the name of Kelli Hahn.  I was leery about going to a new dentist after having my previous dentist for over 20 years.  When I went in for my appointment I was greeted by a friendly staff in a very comfortable environment.  Dr. Hahn was amazing!!!  She was very professional & she made me feel like I've known her for years!!  I am not one who likes to go to the dentist, however Dr. Hahn made what is normally a dreadful experience a pleasurable one!  She's very knowledgeable & caring!!  I would highly recommend Dr. Hahn!!!!
I get soo nervous going to the dentist, but the people here are very nice and welcoming like a good friend!

First, when reading reviews,  I think it is important to look at dates of last review. Although there are reviews for this office they are over a year + old so here is a current one. 

 I took my daughter here for an issue she had from a previous dentist and the doctor we saw was OK BUT the billing practices are to say the least questionable! I gave them my insurance information on the spot and was told they would get back to me on the cost of the work that my daughter needed to have done. Later that evening I actually received a call from the office requesting I pay my deductible right then. I advised I would not do that and wanted to wait to see what the actual bill came to after going through my insurance but they insisted it was a "fee for service" based office and I needed to make that payment. 

I obliged and sent in a check for the full deductible against my better judgment and I WAS  RIGHT!  A few days later I got an explanation of benefits from my provider that stated the "contracted and allowed amount" was only 1/2 of what they charged me for. After a lengthy and frustrating call to their "office manager"  she insisted I was incorrect that they had a "fax" that showed what I should pay "if I came in she could show it to me and go over it with me" and I would have to call my provider. So, as if I get paid to do their job,  I took time from my own business to do their job and spoke with my provider and again I was RIGHT. 

They are trying to charge me for charges that were not allowed by my provider..... When they finally  receive their copy of the explanation of benefits (not a generic fax) they will see they were incorrect. Now, lets just see if they make right with me and refund me the amount I overpaid. 

Keep in mind the next visit they wanted me to just hand over  $ 617.00 because they said that is what that charge will be... No thanks!

I have been a patient here for about three years now. I have nothing but good things to say. They have seen my young son on an emergency visit. They have worked around my schedule when I get last minute work meetings. They are always friendly and willing to work with you. I even got my fiancée hooked!  I highly recommend!

Dr. DeMark is the best dentist on the planet. He is so friendly, warm, and funny. Always making jokes, telling you exactly what he is going to do, and checking in during procedures to make sure you are okay. He calls you the night of your procedure just to make sure everything is okay instead of having you sit in pain miserable overnight on the rare case something goes awry. 

Most people hate their dentists, but, I love mine! If he wasn't married with 8 kids, I'm sure he would love me too!

Anyway, onto business. The whole entire office at Today's Dental is super friendly and accommodating. I love going there (seriously) because everyone is so nice and friendly, they make sure all of your questions are answered, and they spend whatever time they need with you versus making you feel like a number. 

The office is really nice, clean, and they have two TV's with about 100 channels in every room. One for when you are sitting up, and one on the ceiling when you are laying down! Baller!

The hours are great and they normally always have lunch appointments available. 

100% recommend this office. I have referred 4 people there already who are equally as happy with Dr. DeMark and Today's Dental!

So, for the most part, everyone always dreads going to the dentist, either out of fear of pain or the bill. I know I chose the latter for a good portion of my life and knew the day would come when it would "bite" me in the butt.....sorry. Low and behold at the ripe age of 31, 16 years since my last visit to a dentist, three wisdom teeth decided to show me who's boss. Looks like this dental plan is about to pay off...

I'm in a new state, I don't have a dentist or a doctor....... or a psychiatrist (if you were curious). Where do I go? Luckily I have a boss and friend named Amber Williams (plug) who pointed me in the right direction. Also conveniently located around the corner from my place, Today's Dental was the "place to be". Nervously, I made my call to schedule an appointment and was immediately put at ease by the almost impossibly friendly staff. But I knew what was coming, they couldn't fool me. 

In I walked and signed in at the front desk, their smiles and helpfulness, there's no way this is real. I was called in and taken on a tour of the facilities, and I thought that was very very very very cool for some reason. I must have looked like I was 6 years old walking around there. Like a giant 6ft 3in six-year-old. I got in my room and there's TV's on the wall, on the ceiling, all playing Sports Center, are you *^&%^*&ing kidding me??  I was so excited at this point I didn't care what they did, just let me sit down and you guys can get to work. By the way, I'm sorry if this is not at all exciting to you because you go to the dentist all the time like a normal person, but this is crazy to me. 

In short of losing site of the actual review I'll sum this up. My dentist was Dr. DeMark and he's pretty much the coolest guy you could ever hope to have ripping bones from your head. I was at no time uncomfortable and actually wouldn't have minded another 20- 30 minutes. He really might be the coolest guy I've ever met in general now that I think about it. Believe me, this was no easy surgery, but I walked out of there with a giant swollen smile on my face. I was thoroughly educated in how to take care of myself during the healing process and got a phone call later that night from the Dr making sure I was alright and checking that I understood what to do. I mean if this is the typical experience then I'm surprised, it was a pleasure all around and I will never go to another dentist. 

In short, if you're like me and have been an idiot for not going to the dentist, or if you're new to the area looking for a new dentist...go here...because I said so. I honestly can't wait to go back.

The Dentist is tops , state of the Art Equipment
Fast and most of all painless. Good payment plans.
Clean and comfortable. Highly recommend .

Sunday Night - DRAT! A barely year-old crown from another dentist pops out of my mouth for the 2nd time!

Monday - on the recommendation of my boyfriend, I call "Happy Tooth" (pet name due to that cute logo). They're right in my neighborhood and Valerie (front desk sweetheart) is able to set me up with an appointment that same day. She also makes me aware of an Internet special for a full exam (only $30! Thanks, Valerie!)

Monday I meet with Dr. DeMark to asses my situation. Warm, friendly, respectful, knowledgeable, answered my questions, did not feel rushed... just great! 

Jan, the xray tech (ditto above adjectives) did a great job doing my state-of-the-art full-head x-rays and toured me through the place explaining/showing me how new teeth are made RIGHT THERE on the same day...yes, that means, no molds, no temporarily crowns, and no coming back to get the permanent tooth put in. Wow!

Sarah, the dentist hygienist finished up the exam (ditto above adjectives, really so nice) and then I was scheduled to do the extensive dental work just two days later (turns out I needed work on two teeth and a second crown had to be made).

Wednesday - Met again with Dr. DeMark (superhero of dentists in my opinion) and Yhony, his assistant (ditto above adjectives). My gums were numbed with topical ointment first (always appreciate that) before Dr. DeMark did the injections (which he did very easily and quick - thank you!). Both were so great - explained everything, worked quickly/confidently, answered questions, and entertained me with goofy dentist silliness - as they fixed my dental dilema.

I couldn't believe they fixed the first tooth and gum as fast as they did and then started on my second issue. I loved watching Yhony sculpt my new tooth on the computer (still think he should have signed his initials to that work of art!). Both were so thorough, making sure I was ok seriously every 30 seconds (maybe more!). For you TV lovers, yes, you can watch a ba-zilion channels if you want but I mostly enjoyed daydreaming out the window...Was I really there 3 hours??? Bottom line - both teeth look and feel great. 

Later at the front desk, Sandy (ditto above adjectives), explained to me the payment plan through CareCredit, which I am so grateful for. 

It's no wonder my boyfriend calls this place "Happy Tooth"! 
You will, too. Seriously, give them a call. A great team all around. Bravo.

:D  K. Simonetti

Appointment at 130 for paperwork, evaluation for repair that needed to be done, work started immediately upon my approval.  I'm out of the chair before 5 p.m. with a crown, not a temp either.  Jann had an ease in her technique.   Dr. Faran was pleasant and charming.
Today is my last day until next year.  I've had a root canal & crown, a cleaning, and another crown since the first appointment.  Yes it had been a while.  Glad to have found a dental office that's relaxed, mostly on schedule, and they don't give me the impression that they're trying to sell me on something more than what is needed.
My son also comes to this office and says they are much more gentle than what he dealt with at the pediatric dental office.  So what does that tell ya?

Front desk was awesome, Valerie was amazing and explained everything thoroughly. Liz, the dental assistant, put me at ease and made me feel comfortable, and was very knowledgeable. Dr. Ngo was awesome. He made me relaxed and I felt like he was genuine in wanting to make me feel better and make my mouth look better.

I've been going to Eye Priority since 2008. I love this office, very personal, professional and fun. I have been seen by both of their doctors and feel comfortable with each of them. I highly recommend Eye Priority.

I absolutely love Dr. Sawitzke! I have been seeing her for the last 4 years, and she is by far the best eye doctor I've ever been too. I am 43, and have been wearing contacts for the last 30 years. I always get an appointment within a few days of making the call, and I never have to wait more than a few minutes to get into my appointment. Dr. Sawitzki and the staff are awesome. I never feel rushed through my appointment and am confident that the exam is thorough. I am also impressed at the technology in the office. I feel it is important for doctors to keep up with technology.  I have referred many and keep her cards on my desk at work. You cannot go wrong with this office! I doubt you will see any reviews of Eye priority below 5 stars.

I've been going to Dr DeSimone for ten years or more.  I am always really sensitive to changes in my vision / new glasses / etc., and she has always worked with me to find the right solutions.   She is always very patient, thorough, and just a nice person, with a fun sense of humor too.   And her staff is really helpful and professional.   I've been to many different optometrists over the years, and Dr DeSimone really stands out above all the rest.  I'm very happy to give them a strong recommendation!

Dr. Mark Woodland did such poor work on fillings in my families mouth that the next dentist we went to said we should file a lawsuit.

Not only is his work 2nd rate but we are seriously considering filing a suit. 

This man should not be practicing Dentistry.

Dr Morley is the best chiropractor I have seen! I have been going to see Dr Morley and Chris for several years for various medical conditions and have been extremely happy with the care and service. I have never needed an appointment and have never waited more than 10 minutes for an adjustment. My insurance only covers a small amount per year so I am on a great cash package that is only about $10 per adjustment. The cold laser is a great option for inflammation and to speed up healing process. Unbelievably, when I couldn't see him for a neck issue due to my work hours, I was given recommendations to a different Chiro office that offers cold laser and Chris even called for their hours. If that isn't a testament to his commitment to his patient's health and wellness I don't know what is. I would highly recommend this office. He even throws in a free laser treatment every once in a while!

I have lived in the Phoenix area for 32 years and over the years have been to 4 different physical therapy facilities.  Without any doubt, this one, with Lori, is the very best.  Lori helped my back and shoulder problems to the best I've been.  I'll never go anywhere else.  Moreover, everyone is always on time, there is never any wait, all the staff is extremely competent, and the facility has an overall friendly, professional, cheery, and competent atmosphere.
I highly recommend this place. My son and I came here for treatment for plantar fasciitis and it has improved our daily activities. We no longer have foot pain. Thank you!

Great staff!

Came after a broken bone and I'm glad I picked this place. 

They make you feel comfortable and they are very knowledgeable. 

I have only been a couple times so far and I am able to move my leg so much more. 

I would refer them to anyone.

In this office is most important business and not the health of patients.

I attempted several times but I realized that the doctor did not take the time to explain to patients what is best for their children.

We've been going to Ahwatukee Pediatrics for 8 years. We have found the Dr. Kutler and staff to be very friendly, caring and knowledgeable. They can usually fit us in for urgent appointments as well.   We have consistently been given accurate diagnosis and tests are routinely taken when symptoms are present.
We have been seeing Dianne Olson, N.P. for two years.  Professional, supporting, and answers all questions.  The specialties here are spot on, and they are knowledgeable about what they focus on.

I have been trying to get ahold of someone for four days, spoke with three different employees (Lisa, Savannah, and Jennifer) sent two emails, and every time been told I'll get a call back by the end of business day or within 10-15 minutes and have still not received a call back. It's been a simple  refund issue I've tried to have resolved  and am disappointed in the customer service I've received .
Great Spa...Great Staff....everyone friendly and courteous!  Dr Hetrick is professional and so knowledgeable with every service
Dr. Hetrick is the best - I wouldn't go anywhere else in the valley. The rest of the staff is just great too!
This is a beautiful office with very professional and knowledgeable staff. I am loving my results from Ultherapy and can't wait to go back for more treatments from Tamara.

Everyone is great here, friendly, knowledgeable and willing to help. My aesthetician "Tamara" is great, love the results, wish I could get in more often. Ask them anything and they will try their hardest to make sure you have all answers and are satisfied.
No problem recommending this place, convenient booking, friendly staff, decent selection of frames and efficient service.

I've had several poor experiences with eye doctors, and therefore dealt with my horrible eye sight for years. I'm so glad I finally found this place. The doctor is knowledgable, and the staff is very friendly and efficient. Armando specifically was extremely supportive, funny, and patient with me while I learned how to use contacts for the first time. Highly recommend.

The staff are very friendly and they are great with kids.  They seem to really care and there is no sales pressure like at many other vision centers to buy your glasses there.  But, if you want to buy them there, they seem to have a great selection!

This was such a lovely experience. Dr. Pratt are so nice and give good explanations, taking time to answer questions. I don't much enjoy picking out new frames, but the optician was helpful and gave me honest opinions about what looked good on me. I can't wait to get my new glasses!

The experience was quick and the associates there were very helpful! She was not trying to rush me and she was very patient. They also have many different forms of communication to confirm an appt and to notify me when my frames are ready for pick up.

Dr. Pratt has been my go to optometrist for the last 3+ years. Local to Ahwatukee, he will take good care of your family's eye care needs. 

Dr. Pratt serves the community with integrity. For example, on my most recent appointment, my prescription changed very slightly and he recommended keeping the current lenses (all 4), saving me hundreds of dollars. 

In addition, he shared that as I get older, it will be necessary to correct for reading close up, but rather than push for reading glasses or bifocals, he suggested I start with an inexpensive pair of general purpose reading glasses from Walgreens. 

These are the kinds of interactions that make it clear that Lifetime Eye Care do indeed want to earn your business for a lifetime.

I have been a loyal patient to Arizona's Vision, and it all stemmed from the excellent customer service I was given by their staff members on my first visit!!!!  I initially started by going there with a prescription from my previous Doctor. My husband and I went in on a Saturday afternoon at 12:50 (their office closes at 1:00 PM) my intention that day was just to start the process......I struggle with choosing new glasses  every time I get a new prescription, I have difficulty making up my mind and my husband sweet as he is tells me he likes what I like. I was greeted warmly and asked if I could be helped, I let them know that I wanted to browse for a while,  we looked around and I actually found several frames I liked. When I looked up at the clock I noticed it was 1:20, and employees were leaving, I told the nice young lady working with me that I could come back on a different day and she just said that staying and helping me would not be an imposition as she was there specifically to help me and time was not a concern.  We looked through the selection of frames that I had gathered and she gave me opinions as to which she liked and why one would be better suited for my prescription, I never felt pressure to leave or be rushed, she looked up my insurance and explained in detail how it worked, then kindly thanked me for coming in. I was so impressed I scheduled an appointment for my husband that same day, and yes they stayed for me to accomplish this as well. The whole experience was great , from check in to the preliminary testing that was done. The exam as it turned out was exceptional the Doctor was very professional and personable, and some of the equipment that was used on my husband I had never even seen before. I have nothing but good things to say about Arizona's Vision, I and my family will continue to come for years to come.

My car was broken into and among other things my prescription glasses were stolen.  I called Arizona's vision and got in the same day to pick out new glasses.  I worked with both Mike and Ana.  Ana was so caring, once she heard my story she arranged for a discount.  Mike helped me pick the frames, after he saw me reach for a couple of frames he completely understood my style and picked the perfect glasses for me.  Mike was fun, friendly and professional.  Ana was kind, patient and very through.  Today I picked up my glasses and I got to work with Mike again.  I am so happy with Arizona's Vision.  I have been going to this location for about 5 years now, the doctor's, staff, frame selection, just everything is top notch.    I couldn't be happier.

I had a fantastic experience at Arizona's Vision!  Dr. Jung was friendly, thorough, and very knowledgable!  Mike and Cristina helped me choose frames and lenses.  They were both very friendly, helpful, and patient!  What a wonderful office!  I highly recommend them!

I have been going to Desert Dentistry for years and will never go anywhere else. They have always taken great care of me. I go in for cleanings every 6 months and it is always a pleasant experience. They remember my name every time I go in and its not just because I have an appointment at that time. Twice I have walked in with someone else at the same time and they remembered both our names separately. I truly believe this company cares deeply for their customers. A few years ago I had a tooth ache while in Payson and had to go to the office up there. They got me in right away (on a friday) and got me all fixed up. They had to stay late and wait for me and if it did bother them I would not have had a clue because they were professional and patient the whole time. They are very competitive with their pricing too. I have referred friends to them that got estimates from other companies and Desert Dentistry more than beat their competitors. Its nice not to pay an arm and leg for stuff insurance won't cover. Thank you so much Desert Dentistry for everything you do! Myself and my family appreciates you!
Such wonderful staff! Almost made the experience enjoyable! I hate going to the dentist, but I don't mind it as much here. They are always encouraging. Thanks Dr V & Yolanda!

Dr. Villalobos is amazing. She is kind and caring. We had a 6:00pm appointment for my 8 year old ,which is our normal supper time. My kids were so hungry. Her staff brought food for my son and found a yogurt for my daughter who's mouth was numb. They were amazing. I will never go anywhere else.

Dr. Culp and his staff are so good at what they do. I love that they talk to my daughter directly, explaining each step of the process to her instead of telling me what she needs to do. This makes her take responsibility for her own treatment. Their office decor is fun for the kiddos too!

"Dr Culp - you're a miracle worker! I was so impressed with your work today and your ability to fill a cavity for my 5 year old.  

Thanks for giving me all the assurances I needed that conscious sedation would go smoothly.  He experienced NO pain or stress whatsoever.  I trusted you completely and everything turned out perfectly.   Oh my goodness...you're good! 

You know how to speak to children and make them understand what you're doing. The positive reinforcement goes miles with children.  At this rate, he'll never develop a fear of dentists.  

Your waiting room is so inviting & fun, my son never wants to leave.  

My son is so very lucky to have you as his dentist. 
We're so very appreciative of the work you do! 
Thanks MUCH!
